item.title: Mom's Connection Doula Services
item.description: Offering birth doula services in Anderson, Knox, Morgan, and Roane Counties. Included in each package is a free consultation, flexible payment plans and caring, loving support. It is the policy of Momâ€™s Connection Doula Services to treat all patients and not to discriminate regarding race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or disability.
